headline: Constellation Brands, Inc. (STZ): A Bull Case Theory

Constellation Brands, Inc. (STZ)’s share was trading at $177.42 as of March 21st. STZ’s trailing and forward P/E were 47.31 and 12.09 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Constellation […]

headline: Constellation Brands beer executive exits amid tariff uncertainty
summary: Bill Renspie’s departure after more than two decades comes as the Corona brewer faces pressure following a tax on Mexican imports levied by the White House.

headline: Corona embodies the spirit of the beach in new brand platform
summary: Set to premiere on MLB’s opening day, “La Playa Awaits” features extensive sports integrations and embraces Mexican beach culture.
